creator: HDFC Securities Ltd
descriptionHtml:
The stock markets can flip in seconds. That’s precisely the reason why you need a next generation powerful trading app to keep pace with the markets. The all New HDFC securities Android Trading App by HDFC securities Limited, is easier to use, easier to navigate with latest markets update, investment ideas, real time charts, and much more. It will redefine your investing experience.

With HDFC securities Android Trading app, you can never miss a good trading or investment opportunity, here are some key features:

• Trade in Equity & Derivatives
• Stay on top of the Markets
• Get instant details of the stocks in single click.
• Get news and views that impact your stock investments
• Get notifications on key market events
• Conveniently track & trade with multiple watchlists
• Intraday real-time Charting
• Instant access to trending investing ideas
• Just tap and find your next investment opportunity
• Locate our branch closest to you
• Brace for a holistic investment experience.


Investment in securities market are subject to market risks, read all the related documents carefully before investing.

Disclaimer : HDFC securities Ltd is a financial services intermediary and is engaged as a distributor of financial products & services like Corporate FDs & Bonds, Insurance, MF, NPS, Real Estate services, Loans, NCDs & IPOs in strategic distribution partnerships. Customers need to check products &features before investing since the contours of the product rates may change from time to time. HDFC securities Ltd is not liable for any loss or damage of any kind arising out of investments in these products. Investments in Equity, Currency, Futures & Options are subject to market risk. Clients should read the Risk Disclosure Document issued by SEBI & relevant exchanges & the T&C on www.hdfcsec.com before investing. Equity SIP is not an approved product of Exchange and any dispute related to this will not be dealt at Exchange platform.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-Now square off Equity positions in any of the exchanges from Open/Net position .

-View cumulative/single record in Open/Net position in case having multiple equity positions in same scrip, same product and different exchange.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Introducing new margin pledge system as per SEBI norms. Now pledge your stocks with HDFC securities and avail trading limit against securities.

- Invest in thematic portfolios with Basket Investing 

- Open digital account instantly for your friends and family

- Minor bug fixes to improve performance

title: HDFC securities MobileTrading

creator: HDFC Securities Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Experience the Next Generation Trading App for your phone.

Introducing the all-new Android Trading App by HDFC Securities Limited, offering you the latest share market updates, investment ideas, real-time charts, and more. Our app is full of powerful features, a beautiful design, and an enhanced visual interface that will transform how you view the markets.

Features of the HDFC Securities App
● Monitor Live - Stay updated about the stock market and monitor live data for NSE Nifty 50, F&O & view Sensex charts for BSE, on a single screen
● Stay Updated - Find out what news and views affect your stock investments
● Multiple Watchlists - Keep track of various watchlists conveniently and look out for any upcoming IPO
● Place Orders - Use the watchlist to place your buy and sell orders on our Market app
● Quick IPO Apply - Get in on the action early by applying for an IPO with just two clicks with our Quick Apply feature and subscribe instantly via UPI
● Technical Charts - Compare scrips, Track Events, Corporate Actions, and optimize many other features on our Charting tool
● Study the Market - Know the Market in-depth before buying a stock or investing in an upcoming IPO. Receive market live updates to stay informed and on top of the market trends.
● Investment Ideas - Get instant access to trending & expertly curated investment ideas. Simply tap and find your next investment opportunity on our Market app
● Margin Trading – Get higher leverage by just paying a fraction of the cost to enjoy increased returns
● Smart Order Routing – SOR will automatically find the best possible BUY/SELL price & opportunity to execute a trade quickly across exchanges
● Refer & Earn – Spread a word and earn great rewards! Refer a friend and earn up to Rs 2500 gift voucher
● Fund Hold/Release - Hold / Release funds in one click and make fund transfers in your trading account from your HDFC bank account
● Manage your Investments - Keep track of your trades and investments with single-point access to all your accounts
● Diversify your Portfolio - Invest in a number of investment options; Equity, Mutual Funds, Upcoming IPOs, Bonds, Index Funds, ETFs Corporate FDs, and more

Why Choose HDFC Securities?
● It helps you keep track of the share market on the go and place your orders accordingly
● It gives you investment ideas on the app itself, so you do not have to refer to multiple other sources
● You can conveniently invest in stocks or any different kinds of security you prefer from the app

Invest in Stocks
● Invest in the Stock Market in a fast, easy, and secure way with our Stock Market app
● Keep up with live updates on NSE, BSE & MCX stock prices

Invest in Mutual Funds
● Buy or sell in real-time & purchase Intraday and F&O
● Set up your Demat Trading account for free

Investment in the securities market is subject to market risks. Therefore, read all the related documents carefully before investing.

Disclaimer: HDFC securities Ltd is a financial service intermediary engaged as a distributor of financial products & services like Corporate FDs & Bonds, Insurance, MF, NPS, Real Estate Services, Loans, NCDs & IPOs in strategic distribution partnerships. Customers need to check products & features before investing since the contours of the product rates may change from time to time. HDFC securities Ltd is not liable for any loss or damage of any kind arising out of investments in these products. Investments in Equity, Currency, Futures & Options are subject to market risk. Clients should read the Risk Disclosure Document issued by SEBI & relevant exchanges & the T&C on www.hdfcsec.com before investing. Equity SIP is not an approved product of Exchange, and any dispute related to this will not be dealt with at the Exchange platform.

title: HDFC Securities: Trade Stocks

creator: HDFC Securities Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Buy Shares, Mutual Funds, IPO & More; Get Investment Insights & Research Reports
Do you wish to trade & invest in one place? Presenting the HDFC Securities Trading App. Our advanced online trading app boasts powerful features, an intuitive design & a no-frills interface for effortless trading.
HDFC Securities Trading App: What We Offer
The HDFC Securities trading app lets you trade seamlessly with a few clicks on your smartphone.
Exhaustive Offerings: Trade in Large, Mid & Small Cap Stocks, Mutual Funds, Index Funds, IPOs etc via your Demat & Trading account or via the app to diversify your portfolio.
Easy Intraday Trading: HDFC Securities makes Intraday Trading easy with access to Equities, Derivatives, Debentures, F&O, Commodities, ETFs, etc.
Demat Account: Store your investments on 1 digital platform with the HDFC Securities Demat Account linked to your HDFC Securities Trading Account.
Investment Trackers: Get real-time updates on Intraday Trades, Shares, Mutual Funds, etc. Track live data from NSE Nifty 50, BSE Sensex, of the cash and F&O segment on one screen.
IPO Investments: Watch out for the latest IPO launches & place your bids via UPI. Apply for the latest IPOs in just two clicks with our Quick Apply feature.
Watchlists & Orders: Create multiple watchlists of attractive investment opportunities. Place buy/sell orders, stop loss orders and limit orders.
Live Notifications: Get latest news & updates on Stock Market trends, etc., on our share market investment app & learn what's affecting your investments.
Customised recommendations: Get investment recommendations aligned to your past investments & risk appetite. Access research reports & real-time trading charts on the HDFC Sec App.
Technical Charts: Track your investments' performance, compare stocks & learn about events impacting your investments with daily charts & graphs. Check out the charting tool in the HDFC Securities Investment App.
Remote Transactions: Place buy & sell orders remotely on the HDFC Securities share market app.
Market Analyses: Conduct in-depth analyses of your trending securities, stocks to watch out for, live trades, rising performers, etc..
Learn The Ropes: The HDFC Sec trading app takes you from amateur to expert within days. Get access to investment ideas & recognise every upcoming, unmissable investment opportunity.
Margin Trading: Get increased leverage for intraday trades at a fraction of the cost of your chosen securities to enhance your returns. Repay the margin amount over longer, pre-determined tenures at low-interest rates.
Smart Order Routing: Execute trades quickly at the applicable Buy/Sell market prices with our automatic Smart Order Routing (SOR) feature in the HDFC Sec App.
Fund Hold/Release: Make instant, one-click fund transfers with the Release/Hold facility in the HDFC Trading Account & Demat account.
Refer & Earn: Earn rewards & gift vouchers for referring friends and family to HDFC Securities.

Say Hello to us on our Social Handles:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hdfcsecurities
Twitter: https://twitter.com/hdfcsec
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hdfcsec/

Customers need to check products & features before investing since the contours of the product rates may change from time to time.
